#Text=Fort Portal
#Text=Fort Portal is an important town and centre of the Kabarole District in Western Uganda .
#Text=Get in
#Text=Link Bus and Kalita Bus have connections from Kampala to Fort Portal which go via Mubende ( 5-6 hours ) .
#Text=The road has a good asphalt surface , Mubende is found about half way between Kampala and Fort Portal and you can fill up on petrol and buy food and drink there .
#Text=The Link Bus leaves from the bus station near the new Taxi Park in Kampala whenever a bus is full and there is also a Link bus park in Fort Portal .
#Text=The ticket price from Kampala to Fort portal is USh 25,000
#Text=from Fort Portal to Kasese the Link bus cost USh 5,000 .
#Text=The first Link bus from Fort portal to Kasese is at 10AM .
#Text=A van from Fort Portal to Kasese cost USh 6000 and the 1st van goes at around 7AM .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Fort Portal is a small town and it is easily possible to just walk .
#Text=If you need to go further , there are Boda Boda motorbike taxis everywhere in town .
#Text=For about USh 1,000 , you can travel about 2-3 km .
#Text=But beware , they drive fast and are not very safe , and there are no good hospitals around in case you have an accident .
#Text=You can also take a " private hire " ( taxi cab ) which you can find on the corner of the main roundabout in the centre of Fort Portal and some other locations .
#Text=See
#Text=Fort Portal 's on the edge of Uganda ’s equatorial rainforest .
#Text=It 's an enchanting land full of lakes , grasslands , marshes and forests on the lower slopes of the Rwenzori Mountains in western Uganda .

#Text=There are many wonderful lodges within Kibale forest where you can spend a night or two in a tree house experiencing the sounds of the forest 's inhabitants including 8 species of monkey , chimpanzees , the forest elephant , bush pig and giant forest hog .
#Text=Do
#Text=Visit Queen Elizabeth National Park which is less than an hour 's drive from Fort Portal on the way to Mbarara .
#Text=The wide bio-diversity of habitats means that Queen Elizabeth National Park contains the most astonishing number of species - almost 100 types of mammal and 606 different birds !
#Text=The Kazinga Channel alone is said to contain the world 's largest concentration of hippos , but interestingly enough not many crocodiles !
#Text=Other wildlife includes warthogs , buffalo , rare aquatic sitatunga antelope , giant forest hog , beautifully horned Uganda kob , topi , waterbuck , elephant and leopard .
#Text=This is a wonderful national park , sometimes dubbed ' the Pearl of Africa or Switzerland of Africa ' .
#Text=Quite simply this fertile equatorial area is especially scenic , with two lakes connected by a channel overlooked by a high peninsula .
#Text=You will also find volcanic craters , grassy plains and tropical forest .
#Text=As a result it has one of the highest biodiversity ratings in the world .

#Text=Hunting exhibits such as stuffed lions , leopard skins , deer heads and elephants tusks may still be found adorning some hotels and lodges , but the emphasis is certainly more on shooting with a camera these days .

#Text=Many of Uganda 's safaris were poached out in the past , especially elephants , but now the area is protected and elephants numbers are boosted by those entering the park from the Congo , where poaching is still a problem .
#Text=There is also a really funny statue of Sir Gerald Portal on the main road of the town .
#Text=Yes , he does have a gun in his pocket and yes , he is pleased to see you .
#Text=Golfing :
#Text=The town has a nice golf course , just on the main road .
#Text=Entrance is USh 30,000 , and you 'll probably have to find someone there to rent you their set of clubs .
#Text=Kabarole Tours and Safari , Molidina Street
#Text=Plot 1 , ☏ +256774057390 , ✉ info@kabarole-tours.com .
#Text=Crater lake tours and a safari to Queen Elizabeth National Park or chimp and gorilla tracking permits or bike and car hire .
#Text=Nature and Wildlife tours , Fort Portal-Mbarara Road , Kiko Town council , 8 km from Fort Portal , ☏ +256773527979 , ✉ tstephen.tbgg@gmail.com .
#Text=Crater lake tours and a safari to Queen Elizabeth National Park or chimp and gorilla tracking permits .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Fort Portal is famous for its tea .
#Text=This area is gifted by nature with a cool climate which ensures a relatively slow plant growth rate .
#Text=This naturally makes the tea a high grown , high quality tea .
#Text=The consumption of this tea is associated with many health benefits .
#Text=These include anti-allergy , anti-oxidation , anti-hypertension , anti-viral , anti-obese , anti-cancer , anti-bacterial , enzyme inhibition and many other human health problems .
#Text=You can buy the tea in any local shop or even better visit one of Fort Portal 's tea plantations .
#Text=Stanbic Bank , Lugard road .
#Text=Has a MasterCard/Visa ATM .
#Text=Kenya Commerial Bank . Has a MasterCard/Visa ATM .
#Text=Andrews Supermarket .
#Text=Sells fresh bread .
#Text=Eat

#Text=The two " foreigner " restaurants in town are the Gardens Restaurant just opposite the Shell petrol station on the main Lugard Road , and the Dutchess Restaurant ( and hotel ) on Mugurusi Road , right after the Uganda Human Rights Commission building .
#Text=Both places have good pizza and other Western and local dishes , starting around UGX10,000 .
#Text=There are also many good local restaurants in Fort Portal , and they are much cheaper .
#Text=But go early , as food preparation in Uganda takes time .
#Text=Half an hour for some simple fast food is not uncommon .
#Text=Sweet Aromas Bakery , Malibo Road , ☏ +256 790-91615 .
#Text=9AM-9pPM .
#Text=Sells cakes , tea and coffee .
#Text=Cakes from USh 2000 .
#Text=Little Rock Cafe , Kasese road , ☏ +256483422814 .
#Text=8AM-8PM .
#Text=Home of hamburgers from USh 6000 , chips USh 3000 and pot of tea USh 2000 .
#Text=Momo Tea Room ( right on the main total roundabout ) .
#Text=6AM-9PM .
#Text=A good place for breakfast : eggs USh 2000 , chips USh 2500 , bread USh 1000 , black tea USh 700 , milk tea USh 1000 , soft drinks USh 1500 .
#Text=Drink
#Text=The many varieties of tea , fresh fruit juices including pineapple , passion fruit and mango .
#Text=And for the less health conscience Uganda have some excellent beers , Nile , Bell , and Pilsner .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=There is accommodation everywhere in Fort Portal town .
#Text=If your interest is not being as close as possible to the national parks , you can just head to Fort Portal and find a place that suits you upon arrival .
#Text=Meshs Inn , Malibo Road ( over the street from the Tabes Resthouse ) , ☏ +256 392-176281 .
#Text=Clean single room with outside bathroom , clean double room with own bathroom .
#Text=Yes Hostel Backpackers , Lower Kakiiza Rd . ( about 2 km north of the town centre . ) , ☏ +256772780350 , ✉ yesuganda@gmail.com .
#Text=Free Wi-Fi .
#Text=Has a nice garden .
#Text=Own room USh 30,000 .
#Text=Dorm USh 25,000 , camping USh 10,000. .

#Text=Rwenzori Travellers Inn , Plot 16 Kyebambe Rd ( City Centre , left after Shell when entering from Kasese direction ) , ☏ +256483422075 , +256 712 400570 , ✉ reservations@rwenzoritravellersinn.com .
#Text=Has Wi-Fi , breakfast included .
#Text=Single USh 51,000 , double USh 75,000 .

#Text=Mountain of the Moon Hotel ( Mountains of the Moon Hotel 2000 ltd ) , Plot 4 , Nyaika Ave ( about 2 km north of town centre along Toro Road ) , ☏ +256483423200 , +256 775 557840 , toll-free : +256 483 423200 , ✉ info@mountainsofthemoonhotel.com .
#Text=Check-in : 2PM , check-out : 10AM .
#Text=A top high-end tourist hotel on the way to Queen Elizabeth National Park .
#Text=Wi-Fi , restaurant , bar , conference , pool , gym , accommodation and wedding receptions .
#Text=Single USD125 , deluxe double USD145 , superior double USD170 , family room USD235 , twin USD165 .
#Text=Fort Motel ( 400m from main postal station , next to golf course ) , ☏ +256 772-501731 , +256 792-220259 , ✉ reservations@fortmotel.com .
#Text=Breakfast included , nice gardens and pool .
#Text=Free Wi-Fi .
#Text=Single USD45-100 , double USD70-140.
#Text=Rwenzori View Guesthouse , Lower Kakiiza Road ( About 2km north of town centre . ) , ☏ +256772722102 , +256 483 422102 , ✉ ruwview@gmail.com .
#Text=Family run , nice garden .
#Text=Home cooked meals at big joint dinner table .
#Text=Breakfast included .
#Text=Single from USh 60,000 , double from USh 90,000 .
#Text=Exotic Lodge , next to Kabarole tours ( Behind Dons Plaza ) .
#Text=10 single/double rooms with shared bathroom .
#Text=Single USh 15,000
#Text=double USh 20,000 .
#Text=Tabes Resthouse , Plot 4 Malibo Road ( off Kasese road ) , ☏ +256714775620 , +256 711-589811 .
#Text=Check-in : 10AM , check-out : 10AM .
#Text=Clean single room with outside hot water bathroom or clean double room with own bathroom .
#Text=Has nets .
#Text=Place Motel Limited , Plot 33 Muzosi Road .
#Text=Check-in : 11AM , check-out : 10AM .
#Text=Double room with own bathroom and breakfast USh 44,000 .
#Text=Golf Course View Guesthouse , Rwenzori Road , ☏ +256 772-485602 .
#Text=Single/double rooms with own bathrooms .
#Text=Sometimes has hot water .
#Text=From USh 30,000 .
#Text=Visitours Guest house , plot no 2 Babiiha Road , ☏ +256 483-422813 .
#Text=Check-in : 11AM , check-out : 10AM .
#Text=Double with own bathroom .
#Text=USh 30,000 .
